name: Owen Lars & Beru Lars
Lore: 'Watchful guardians of Luke Skywalker. When the Lars'' moisture farm was attacked by stormtroopers, Luke''s life changed forever.',
Text: 'Deploy free to Lars'' Moisture Farm. Draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise. If opponent has a Stormtrooper at a Tatooine site, you may not play Harvest. If lost during opponent''s turn, Luke is power +6 until end of your next turn.',
